sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Another month and another record inflation number.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Prices in the Eurozone rose by 10% in the 12 months to September.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: In comparison, just a year ago, prices were rising at only 3.4%.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Once again, the biggest driver of inflation was energy, rising by 40% in 12 months.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Food, alcohol and tobacco were also big drivers, although less than in previous months.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: But the trip to the pumps may continue to be painful for some time.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The war in Ukraine has disrupted global oil and gas supply.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Europe is heading into a hard winter, which may include forced reductions in energy as countries struggle to cope with the scarcity of gas.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The worry is if energy inflation continues to remain high, it will lock in price rises in other sectors of the economy, perhaps for the long term.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The elections in Brazil may have consequences for the implementation of the trade agreement

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: between the EU and the Mercosur.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: In 2019, the two blocs signed a trade agreement considered to be the world's largest at the time.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The Mercosur is the fifth largest economy in the world outside the EU, with an annual output of 2.2 trillion euros. Its population is of 260 million people and the EU exports 45 billion euros in goods annually to Mercosur.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: For it to come into force, all member states need to ratify the agreement.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: But this has not happened yet.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Under pressure from Paris, Brussels now wants guarantees that the Amazon forest will not be destroyed in favour of the expansion of the South American grain and cattle producers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The Macron government has a legitimate position against the agreement in theory, because of environmental issues. So additional commitments are being negotiated. But once those environmental and additional commitments are eventually agreed upon, there is no more excuse not to start the ratification process.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Because right now the agricultural arguments have not been put on the table, not even in France, to prevent the initiation of the ratification process.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Deforestation figures in Brazil have increased since the election of Jair Bolsonaro, as have budget cuts to environment-related federal agencies.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: There's a very significant reduction in the rate of deforestation between about 2004 and 2012.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: It comes down about 80 percent, which shows that when there's political will, there is an infrastructure in place for Brazil to monitor and to deter and to curb the rate of deforestation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The deal with Mercosur sets environmental targets for all of its signatories. Many countries in the EU, for example, are also far from their own CO2 targets.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: As Bulgaria prepares for another round of parliamentary elections,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: polls predict the Boyko Borisov's Gerb party is leading with 25% of the vote, followed by the recently ousted Kirill Petkov's We Continue the Change party.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The Bulgarian Socialist party has dropped to fifth place behind the Movement for Rights and Freedom's party and the Nationalist Revival Party, as Georgi Karamfilov reports.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The parties of the former prime ministers are fighting for the top spot. It is a Bulgaria will have to vote for the fourth time in less than a year and a half and choose its Parliament again. It is important to say that these are early parliamentary elections and the reason for that is that the former prime minister's cabinet was taken down by a non-confidence vote on the 22nd of June. The parties of the former prime ministers are fighting for the top spot. It is expected that either Boyko Borisov's GERD party or Kirill Petkov's We Continue the Change party will be first on these elections.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The big surprise on these elections is expected to be the far-right nationalist party revival, which is led by Kostadin Kostadinov.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: is led by Kostadin Kostadinov. In the last elections his party was last in the parliament but now the expectations are that he will be at least third. Petkov's former coalition partners from the previous parliament are not expected to improve their results in the elections and on the contrary it is expected that they will get even less votes than on the last elections, which makes the task of electing a new government even more hard.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: This is Fugod, one of the gypsy slums in Ent in northeastern Hungary.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Of the 132 pupils here, 90% of them are gypsy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: However, a new wing of classrooms burnt to the ground last year possibly due to a short circuit torn blackboards and burnt textbooks serve as a grim reminder of what happened but the school was already at capacity and containers had to be installed in the er before the disaster to ensure that education could continue without disruption just a year before the fire for for example, this corridor was painted.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Interactive whiteboards were installed in the classrooms.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The toilets were renovated and new furniture was installed in the teachers' room.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: But everything was lost.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: No one knows yet when the children of Fugud will be able to learn again in the comfort they enjoyed a year ago.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Most of the people in Fugud do not have a car or money for a bus so it is important for them to be within walking distance of school while the staff are doing their best they maintain it is difficult to concentrate on learning in these conditions the teachers say they have developed trusting relationships with all parents while the headmistress says they couldn't stop teaching and a solution had to be found quickly.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Lower grade pupils are in the building in the morning and upper school pupils in the afternoon.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Catering for the pupils is the same as before, so they are provided with breakfast, lunch and snacks.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: But as winter approaches, students and teachers alike are anxiously waiting for renovations to begin.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: After the disaster, there were only three toilets left in the institution, one for teachers and two for students.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The local mayor says he has called on members of parliament many times to resolve the problem, but they have yet to provide funds.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: This comes as Budapest plans to build a new national Athletic Centre with construction costs totalling 310 million euros.

King Charles the third's portrait will now appear on a special five pound crown and 50 pence coin commemorating the life and legacy of the queen.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: To describe the image that people will see, King Charles III faces to the left in the opposite direction to the late queen. The inscription, the words around the portrait read Charles III, by the grace of God, king, defender of the faith, and it carries the date as well.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: The Zurich Film Festival is one of the great autumn cinema events, offering a rich competition of films from Europe and elsewhere, as well as numerous previews and tributes in the presence of international stars. Liam Neeson and Diane Kruger were there this week, and two European actors were awarded with a Golden Eye, the French-English actress Charlotte Gainsbourg, and the British Eddie Redmayne.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: This exhibition at the National Gallery in London features paintings by one of Europe's best-known figurative painters, Lucien Freud.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: It covers a lifetime of work, showing how Freud's paintings evolved over 70 years of practice. Throughout his long career Freud sought to get closer to his models to pierce their intimacy through the pigments of his paint. At Paris's Arab World Institute an exhibition which offers, for the first time, a journey through the queer culture of the Arab world, also shaken by gender issues.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Twenty-three artists from Iran, Afghanistan, Morocco, Libya and more make up the exhibition called Habibi, the revolutions of love this exhibition in Madrid is about two almost contemporary artists whose personalities and trajectories are certainly different but biographically parallel and culturally close in Julio Gonzales, Pablo Picasso and the dematerialization of sculpture, the joint work scene here is considered by many art historians to be the moment when iron sculpture was invented.
